Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-50782 affecting package python-cryptography for versions less than 3.3.2-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-50782 affecting package python-cryptography for versions less than 3.3.2-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-cryptography is earlier than 3.3.2-7, affected by CVE-2023-50782
